content: अभिनंद {%<ab>a.</ab>%} That which delights, encourages, praises &c. --दः {@--1@} Rejoicing, delighting, joy, delight. {@--2@} Praising, applauding, approving, greeting, congratulating. {@--3@} Wish, desire. {@--4@} Encouraging, inciting to action. {@--5@} Very little happiness (सुखलव). {@--6@} An epithet of परमात्मन् the Supreme Being. --दा Delight; wish, desire.
